name: @trippler/tr_lib
description: A lightweight utility & helper library for FiveM developers. Designed to improve code reusability, consistency, and performance across and outcross Trippler resources.
author: Trippler

scripts.patch: npm run rebuild && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm run rebuild && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.rebuild: rmdir /s /q client server shared nui 2>nul & npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:nui
